1.title: Stuck Together
1.plot: Steven and Lars spend some time together.

2.title: The Trial
2.plot: Steven goes to court with the Diamonds and is put on trial.

3.title: Off Colors
3.plot: Steven and Lars discover some unexpected allies. And Lars finds something in himself he doesn't know he has.

4.title: Lars' Head
4.plot: Steven and Lars together on home world learn a lot about how things work there

5.title: Dewey Wins
5.plot: Steven helps Mayor Dewey face a new political foe.

6.title: Gemcation
6.plot: The Crystal Gems and Greg decides that Steven needs a vacation after his experiences on Homeworld.

8.title: Back to the Kindergarten
8.plot: Steven, Amethyst, and Peridot visit the Kindergarten again, and try introduce life back to it.

9.title: Sadie Killer
9.plot: Sadie is struggling to handle working without Lars. Steven and the Cool Kids start a band.

10.title: Kevin Party
10.plot: Kevin invites Connie and Steven to a party

11.title: Lars of the Stars
11.plot: Steven and Connie go visit Lars in space but things have changed.

12.title: Jungle Moon
12.plot: Stevonnie crash lands on a unknown planet.

13.title: Your Mother and Mine
13.plot: Steven takes Garnet to meet his new friends.

14.title: The Big Show
14.plot: Steven shoots a documentary about Sadie Killer and the Suspects.

15.title: Pool Hopping
15.plot: Steven and Garnet explore the most unlikely time lines within Beach City.

16.title: Letters to Lars
16.plot: Steven writes letters to Lars talking about the latest news and events that transpired in Beach City.

17.title: Can't Go Back
17.plot: Steven travels to the moon to identify a plethora of answers to his questions while coming across a certain friend unexpectedly.

18.title: A Single Pale Rose
18.plot: Steven helps Pearl find her cell phone.

19.title: Now We're Only Falling Apart
19.plot: Followed by hearing about the revelation, many problems ensue within the crystal gems' relationships.

20.title: What's Your Problem?
20.plot: Amethyst convinces Steven to take a break after all he's been through.

22.title: Made of Honor
22.plot: Ruby and Sapphire are planning their wedding, Steven decides to invite an old friend.

23.title: Reunited
23.plot: Steven brings everyone together for a special reunion.

24.title: Legs From Here to Homeworld
24.plot: After managing to convince Blue and Yellow Diamond of his true identity, Steven tries to get them to repair the gems they damaged. But in order to do this, they must seek help from a peculiar ally back on Homeworld.

25.title: Familiar
25.plot: White Diamond believes that Steven is Pink Diamond, so Steven tries to fit Pink's part so that way he can get close enough to White to ask her about helping the corrupted gems on Earth.

26.title: Together Alone
26.plot: Steven throws a party to bring his family together.

27.title: Escapism
27.plot: Steven uses his psychic powers to find help.

28.title: Change Your Mind
28.plot: After landing on homeworld, Steven embarks on a journey to convince White Diamond to listen to him so he can help the corrupted gems back on Earth.

0.title: Pilot
0.plot: Steven gets a hold of a magical time travel hourglass and does what any kid would do - he uses it for comebacks. But toying with magic draws trouble to his sleepy beach town and Steven has to step up and save the day - with more comebacks.

1.title: Gem Glow
1.plot: Steven thinks his favorite ice cream sandwiches are the trick to summoning his magic shield but learns otherwise when facing off with an acid spewing insect monster.

2.title: Laser Light Cannon
2.plot: Steven and his father, Greg, search for a light canon that is the only thing that can stop an extraterrestrial object from destroying Beach City.

3.title: Cheeseburger Backpack
3.plot: Steven takes his newest backpack along on a mission to save a Gem sanctuary.

4.title: Together Breakfast
4.plot: Steven makes the perfect breakfast, and is determined to share it with the gems.

5.title: Frybo
5.plot: Steven tries to help a friend get out of an annoying job.

6.title: Cat Fingers
6.plot: When Steven tries shapeshifting for the first time, it doesn't go as expected.

7.title: Bubble Buddies
7.plot: Steven tries to work up the courage to talk to a girl on the beach.

8.title: Serious Steven
8.plot: Steven tries to prove himself to be a worthy Crystal Gem to Garnet while they navigate their way out of an ancient gem maze.

9.title: Tiger Millionaire
9.plot: Steven and Amethyst create alter egos so they can secretly enter a wrestling tournament.

10.title: Steven's Lion
10.plot: Steven finds a magical lion in the desert.

11.title: Arcade Mania
11.plot: Steven invites the gems to go to an arcade with him.

12.title: Giant Woman
12.plot: Steven urges Amethyst and Pearl to fuse together into a giant four-armed woman named Opal.

13.title: So Many Birthdays
13.plot: Steven throws birthday parties for the Gems when he learns that they are thousands of years old, but soon starts to question his own age.

14.title: Lars and the Cool Kids
14.plot: Lars just wants to hang out with the cool kids but is afraid that Steven will ruin everything.

15.title: Onion Trade
15.plot: Onion has one of Steven's toys and while Steven is trying to get it back, the trade escalates into epic proportions.

16.title: Steven the Sword Fighter
16.plot: Pearl tries to teach Steven the art of sword-fighting using a holographic version of himself.

17.title: Lion 2: The Movie
17.plot: Steven and Connie get more than they bargained for when they decide to ride Lion to a movie premiere.

18.title: Beach Party
18.plot: After a battle damages Fish Stew Pizza, the Gems are banned from the restaurant. To apologize, Steven throws a cookout at the Temple to mend the relationship between the Pizza family and the Crystal Gems.

19.title: Rose's Room
19.plot: Steven goes by himself to a new room in the Temple that answers his every wish, but the results become lackluster.

20.title: Coach Steven
20.plot: After seeing Garnet and Amethyst fuse together into the powerful Sugilite, Steven becomes determined to get super strong.

21.title: Joking Victim
21.plot: After Lars fakes an injury to get out of work, Steven and Sadie plot revenge with a little help from Amythest.

22.title: Steven and the Stevens
22.plot: Steven needs a musical partner for an upcoming show, and uses a time travel device to recruit the perfect bandmate: himself.

23.title: Monster Buddies
23.plot: After accidentally freeing a bubbled gem monster, Steven becomes determined to train it.

24.title: An Indirect Kiss
24.plot: A sad Steven tells Connie the story of his mission to heal Amythest when she cracks her gem.

25.title: Mirror Gem
25.plot: Steven finds a mirror which can communicate with him, ending up forming a friendship of sorts. However, the Gems know something that Steven doesn't about the mirror.

26.title: Ocean Gem
26.plot: Lapis Lazuli has gone crazy and stolen the ocean. Steven and his friends have to convince Lapis to give the ocean back.

27.title: House Guest
27.plot: With his van wrecked and leg broken, Greg convinces Steven and the gems to let him live with them while Pearl repairs the van and Steven try out his healing powers.

28.title: Space Race
28.plot: Steven, Pearl, and Greg work together to build a spaceship so that Pearl can revisit the wonders of the cosmos, but Pearl gets a little carried away.

29.title: Secret Team
29.plot: Steven, Pearl and Amethyst form a secret team to keep something hidden from Garnet.

30.title: Island Adventure
30.plot: Island Adventure: Steven takes Lars and Sadie on a vacation to a magical beach to mend their friendship.

31.title: Keep Beach City Weird!
31.plot: Keep Beach City Weird!: Steven gets caught up in Ronaldo's paranormal theories about the strange occurrences in Beach City.

32.title: Fusion Cuisine
32.plot: Connies parents want to meet Stevens family.

33.title: Garnet's Universe
33.plot: Garnet's Universe: Steven imagines what Garnet does with her day.

34.title: Watermelon Steven
34.plot: Steven finds out he has his mom's power to make plants have cognitive thought and brings watermelons to life, until all of them attack the gems.

35.title: Lion 3: Straight to Video
35.plot: Lion won't stop laying on Steven's face while he sleeps.

36.title: Warp Tour
36.plot: Steven becomes uneasy after seeing an unknown object traversing through a warp stream, despite the Gems' attempts to disprove his claims.

37.title: Alone Together
37.plot: The Gems try to teach Steven to use his fusion powers.

38.title: The Test
38.plot: Steven finds out that his mission to the Lunar Sea Spire was a test and demands a new one.

39.title: Future Vision
39.plot: Steven learns that Garnet can see into the future and becomes paranoid about the possible dangers that lurk around him.

40.title: On the Run
40.plot: Steven and Amethyst try out life on the road. Steven gets tired of it soon, so Amethyst takes him to a forgotten canyon called "The Kindergarten", that holds the dark secret of her origin.

41.title: Horror Club
41.plot: Steven goes to the lighthouse in Beach City to watch scary movies with Ronaldo, Sadie and Lars. However, something else is with them.

42.title: Winter Forecast
42.plot: Steven and his dad have to get Connie home before it snows, but Steven, selfishly wishing to spend more time with his friend, tries to stall, which leads to bad outcomes and strange jumps through time.

43.title: Maximum Capacity
43.plot: A garage sale reunites Greg and Amethyst when they find and binge-watch their favorite cheesy sitcom - Lil' Butler. They get so much into it, that Greg loses track of time and lonely Amethyst likes it that way.

44.title: Marble Madness
44.plot: With the Gems tired of fighting waves of Peridot's robots, Steven comes up with a new, but dangerous plan to try and end it.

45.title: Rose's Scabbard
45.plot: Lion finds the scabbard to Rose's lost sword. Steven knows where the sword is. Pearl realizes that Rose, the one person she was deeply intimate with, kept secrets from her and becomes highly emotional, confused and upset.

46.title: The Message
46.plot: The wailing stone is receiving a message, but the Gems can't make it out so Greg tries to help out.

47.title: Political Power
47.plot: When Pearl accidentally causes a blackout, Steven helps Mayor Dewey keep the morale of Beach City's residents high.

48.title: The Return
48.plot: A new threat arrives in Beach City.

49.title: Jail Break
49.plot: Steven tries to escape Jasper's clutches with the Crystal Gems.

50.title: Full Disclosure
50.plot: After defeating Jasper and Peridot, Steven has trouble telling Connie about his most recent adventure.

51.title: Open Book
51.plot: After completing a series of novels, Steven and Connie wish to make their own ending thus opening Rose's room allowing Steven and Connie to create whatever they desire reality. things go south when Steven has disagreements about the book ending and they both end up facing an enemy they both recognize.

52.title: Joy Ride
52.plot: Open Book: Steven and Connie want a new ending to a beloved book series, so Steven takes them into Rose's Room to re-enact it. / Joy Ride: The Cool Kids help Steven put some fun back in his life.

1.title: Say Uncle
1.plot: Steven meets Uncle Grandpa while trying to unlock the power of his mother's gem. Hilarity and weirdness ensues.

2.title: Story for Steven
2.plot: Greg tells Steven about how he met Rose and how meeting Rose changed his universe.

3.title: Shirt Club
3.plot: Steven and Buck Dewey make T-Shirts inspired by a flyer ad Steven made.

7.title: Love Letters
7.plot: Jamie the Mailman is in love with Garnet and pours his heart into a love letter he leaves for her but, Garnet is a relationship and 3 is a crowd. When Steven and Connie help write a reply to let down Jamie easy it all goes wrong.

8.title: Reformed
8.plot: Steven, Amethyst and Garnet chase a corrupted gem monster through the Temple.

9.title: Sworn to the Sword
9.plot: Pearl teaches Connie how to sword fight on Steven's request but it doesn't go quite as planned.

10.title: Rising Tides/Crashing Skies
10.plot: Ronaldo is creating a documentary about whether Steven and the Crystal Gems are safe for the town of Beach City.

11.title: Keeping It Together
11.plot: Steven and the Crystal Gems revisit the Kindergarten and find a dark secret.

12.title: We Need to Talk
12.plot: We Need to Talk: Greg tells Steven and Connie the story of how he learned about Gem fusion.

13.title: Chille Tid
13.plot: The gang goes out to search for Lapis and Jasper's fusion when night falls. Steven, Pearl and Amethyst are forced by Garnet to stay home and rest, but Steven starts having vivid dreams of the two they have been looking for.

14.title: Cry for Help
14.plot: Steven's favorite TV show gets interrupted by a magical disturbance.

15.title: Keystone Motel
15.plot: Steven, Greg, and Garnet face challenges and adventures, making interesting stops along the way as they head out on the open road on a road trip together.

16.title: Onion Friend
16.plot: Steven and Amethyst visit the strange world of Onion's house.

17.title: Historical Friction
17.plot: Steven helps Jamie with his play about Beach city.

18.title: Friend Ship
18.plot: The Crystal Gems explore an ancient Gem spaceship.

19.title: Nightmare Hospital
19.plot: Steven and Connie must sneak into a hospital to recover Rose's sword from Connie's mother.

20.title: Sadie's Song
20.plot: After Steven finds Sadie singing in the Big Donut, he and her mom work to get Sadie to sing at this year's Beach-a-Palooza as the secret guest.

21.title: Catch and Release
21.plot: An unlikely visitor seeks help from Steven. When the Gems intervene, Steven takes matters into his own hands.

22.title: When It Rains
22.plot: When Steven helps a friend who is afraid of storms, a new alliance is formed.

23.title: Back to the Barn
23.plot: Pearl and Peridot build robots in a barn.

24.title: Too Far
24.plot: Amethyst finds mocking others very funny until she's the one who gets mocked.

25.title: The Answer
25.plot: Garnet tells Steven the story of how she became a crystal gem

26.title: Steven's Birthday
26.plot: Steven has a birthday party out at the barn, and decides he has some growing up to do.

27.title: It Could've Been Great
27.plot: While working on their drill, Peridot and the Gems realize they're missing something important and must travel to a Homeworld base.

28.title: Message Received
28.plot: Peridot double-crosses the Crystal Gems when she activates a direct line Communicator to contact Yellow Diamond.

29.title: Log Date 7 15 2
29.plot: Whilst Peridot is in turmoil over her actions, Steven listens to her audio diary and learns how she and Garnet learned to get along during her time at the barn, despite their radical differences.

1.title: Super Watermelon Island
1.plot: Using his Astral Projection ability, Steven discovers that Malachite is at Mask Island, where the remaining Watermelon Stevens have now taken up residence.

2.title: Gem Drill
2.plot: Since Garnet, Pearl and Amethyst can't return immediately, Steven and Peridot must start drilling down the Earth's core by themselves to find a way to stop Cluster's awakening.

3.title: Same Old World
3.plot: In an attempt to persuade Lapis to stay on Earth, Steven shows her around to give an idea of where she may want to live.

4.title: Barn Mates
4.plot: Steven attempts to get two of his close friends to like each other.

5.title: Hit the Diamond
5.plot: Steven and the Gems play an old fashioned game of baseball.

6.title: Steven Floats
6.plot: Steven discovers he can float but must learn to control his power in order to get a fresh donut.

7.title: Drop Beat Dad
7.plot: A familiar face comes back to Beach City.

8.title: Mr. Greg
8.plot: Now owner of a massive fortune, Greg takes Steven to Empire City for a vacation, and Steven invites Pearl, despite the tensions between her and Greg.

9.title: Too Short to Ride
9.plot: Peridot accompanies Steven and Amethyst for a day of fun at Funland.

10.title: The New Lars
10.plot: Steven tries to make the best of waking up in the body of Lars.

11.title: Beach City Drift
11.plot: Steven and Connie come across an old enemy from way back when and try to beat him in his game

12.title: Restaurant Wars
12.plot: Steven settles a rivalry between owners.

13.title: Kiki's Pizza Delivery Service
13.plot: Restaurant Wars: Steven must help the Frymans and the Pizzas settle a reignited rivalry between their restaurants. / Kiki's Pizza Service Delivery: Steven saves Kiki from some delicious nightmares.

14.title: Monster Reunion
14.plot: Steven learns more about himself, an old friend and the dark powers of the gem matriarchy.

15.title: Alone at Sea
15.plot: Steven and Greg take Lapis on a trip out to sea.

16.title: Greg the Babysitter
16.plot: Past-Greg visits an old friend and gets a taste of the responsibility to come.

17.title: Gem Hunt
17.plot: Steven, Pearl and Connie go to the Great North to hunt down a corrupted gem.

18.title: Crack the Whip
18.plot: Amethyst looks after Steven and Connie while Pearl and Garnet look for Jasper's whereabouts.

19.title: Steven vs. Amethyst
19.plot: Steven And Amethyst compete against each other while training with Pearl.

20.title: Bismuth
20.plot: Steven discovers something the Gems thought was lost to the past inside of Lion's mane.

21.title: Beta
21.plot: Amethyst acts strangely when she and Steven visit friends from the country.

22.title: Earthlings
22.plot: After finding Jasper once again, but now in the Beta Kindergarten, Steven and Amethyst face off with her. Jasper had been trapping corrupted gems in holes around the Kindergarten to use as an army. Be prepared for a battle.

23.title: Back to the Moon
23.plot: Steven and the gems return to the Moon Base.

24.title: Bubbled
24.plot: Steven is stuck in a bubble.

2.title: Know Your Fusion
2.plot: Steven and the gems experiment with fusions.

3.title: Buddy's Book
3.plot: Steven visits the Library with Connie and uncovers a long lost book.

4.title: Mindful Education
4.plot: Steven and Connie learn to focus better.

5.title: Future Boy Zoltron
5.plot: Steven tells people's fortune at Funland.

6.title: Last One Out of Beach City
6.plot: Steven, Amethyst, and Pearl go to a rock concert.

7.title: Onion Gang
7.plot: Steven finds out about Onion's secret friends.

8.title: Gem Harvest
8.plot: Steven's autumn visit to see Lapis and Peridot brings a new stranger into his life.

9.title: Three Gems and a Baby
9.plot: Greg tells Steven the story of his first winter with Steven.

10.title: Steven's Dream
10.plot: A strange dream prompts Steven to search for answers.

11.title: Adventures in Light Distortion
11.plot: The Gems take off in a search and recovery mission.

12.title: Gem Heist
12.plot: The Gems try to pull off a heist

14.title: That Will Be All
14.plot: Steven and the Gems make a daring escape.

15.title: The New Crystal Gems
15.plot: Connie helps look after Beach City while Steven is busy.

16.title: Storm in the Room
16.plot: Steven goes into his room in the temple to look for answers.

17.title: Rocknaldo
17.plot: Ronaldo sets out to find all the rock people living in Beach City.

18.title: Tiger Philanthropist
18.plot: Feeling that the reign of Purple Puma and Tiger Millionaire has played out, Amethyst decides to quit the wrestling duo. It's now up to Steven to please the underground wrestling fans of Beach City.

19.title: Room for Ruby
19.plot: Tiger Philanthropist: Steven returns to the ring to continue his pro wrestling odyssey. / Room for Ruby: Steven's Gem family continues to grow.

20.title: Lion 4: Alternate Ending
20.plot: Steven discovers a key that holds the answers to more questions that have been troubling him.

21.title: Doug Out
21.plot: Steven and Connie join Connie's father on a stake out.

22.title: The Good Lars
22.plot: Steven, Lars and Sadie get invited to a party with the Cool Kids.

23.title: Are You My Dad?
23.plot: People are disappearing from Beach City, and Steven tries to solve the mystery.

24.title: I Am My Mom
24.plot: After Events that have taken place in the past, Steven tries to fix all his mistakes.

1.title: Episode #6.1
1.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: This series is set in the fictional Beach City, where ageless alien warriors, the Crystal Gems, live in an ancient beachside temple, protecting the world from evil. They project female humanoid forms from magical gemstones that are the core of their being. The Crystal Gems are Garnet, Amethyst, Pearl and Steven, a young half-human, half-Gem boy who inherited his gemstone from his mother, the Gems' former leader Rose Quartz. As Steven tries to figure out his powers, he spends his days with his human father Greg, his friend Connie, other people in Beach City, or the other Gems, whether to help them save the world or just to hang out. He explores the abilities passed down to him by his mother, which include fusion (the ability of Gems to merge their identities and bodies to form a new and more powerful personality).
imdb.title: Steven Universe
plot: A team of intergalactic warriors fights to protect the universe, but the combination of three highly trained beings and one quirky young boy leaves the team struggling to overcome the dangerous scenarios that are put in front of them.::Dynasti Noble

This series is set in the fictional Beach City, where ageless alien warriors, the Crystal Gems, live in an ancient beachside temple, protecting the world from evil. They project female humanoid forms from magical gemstones that are the core of their being. The Crystal Gems are Garnet, Amethyst, Pearl and Steven, a young half-human, half-Gem boy who inherited his gemstone from his mother, the Gems' former leader Rose Quartz. As Steven tries to figure out his powers, he spends his days with his human father Greg, his friend Connie, other people in Beach City, or the other Gems, whether to help them save the world or just to hang out. He explores the abilities passed down to him by his mother, which include fusion (the ability of Gems to merge their identities and bodies to form a new and more powerful personality).

5000 years after a great war of Gems, gemstone-like beings from a planet called Homeworld, we meet Steven, a half boy half gem who lives with the "Crystal Gems" Garnet, Amythest, and Pearl, who live on earth after they rebelled against Homeworld. The story follows Steven's adventures, whether he is fighting monsters or learning to control his own powers.::Stevie Lee Silverman

_Steven Universe_ (qv) lives with the Crystal Gems: Garnet, Amethyst and Pearl. Being half-Gem and half-human, Steven's mother, Rose Quartz, 'sacrificed' herself to give her son true form, and to bridge the gap between Gems and humans through his father, Greg Universe. Steven and The Gems live in Beach City, and together they protect their town from the Gems' planet: Homeworld. Steven must master his mother's powers and will become something greater than himself: a hero who fights for what is right.::Johnny
